title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Mount Baldy Area is Closed  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Mount Baldy Area is Closed  The Mount Baldy area is closed due to hazardous conditions until further notice. Please visit the rest of the 99% of the national lakeshore that is open.     Information        National Lakeshore’s Tremont Picnic Area Closed for Paving  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, National Lakeshore’s Tremont Picnic Area Closed for Paving  Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore’s Tremont Picnic Area will be closed for a paving project. The picnic area, located at 25 East US Highway 12 will be closed starting at 7:00 a.m.Wednesday, August 3 and will reopen by 7:00 a.m.on August 31, 2016.
